channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Avoiding CDN supply-chain attacks with Subresource Integrity (SRI)
item.description: In this post I discus the recent pollyfill.io supply-chain attack and describe how to protect against similar attacks using Subresource Integrity (SRI) Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/avoiding-cdn-supply-chain-attacks-with-subresource-integrity/

item.title: Combining multiple docker images into a multi-arch image
item.description: In this post I show two ways to combine multiple docker images into a single multi-arch image, discuss manifests and manifest lists, and why they matter Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/combining-multiple-docker-images-into-a-multi-arch-image/
